name: A different All is brawl
description: An edited version of the global colours scheme edited specifically for aib
css:
/*
 "myfavolours" - global custom colour scheme
 http://userstyles.org/styles/2187
 BEGIN
*/

/*
 summary:
 - basic background = dark grey
 - basic text = darkslategrey
 - "semantic" importance = contrast
 - unvisited links (and form labels) = sienna
 - visited links = light green
 - underline links = false. (the only "bad" but IMO excusable thing)
 - form elements, :hover, :focus, and more

 latest revisions
 +2008-08-18+ FF3 fix
*/



@-moz-document
 url-prefix(http://allisbrawl.com) ,
 url-prefix(https://allisbrawl.com)
{


/*
  *
   * init
   * - setting basic colours / background
   * - disabling background images
  *
 *
*/

html
{ background-color : gold  !important
; border-color     : gold !important
}

body
{ background-color :  !important
; border-color     : gold !important
; color            : green !important
}

body *
{ background-color : inherit !important
; border-color     : yellow !important /* "inherit" is bugged ! */
; color            : burlywood !important
}

html  ,
html *
{ background-image : none !important
}

/*
  *
   * semantic blocks
  *
 *
*/

/*
  * top header:
 *
*/

/*
 * - wannabe
*/
.head  ,
.header  ,
*[id*="title"]  ,
*[id*="Title"]  ,
*[id*="head"]  ,
*[id*="Head"]  ,
*[class*="header"]  ,
*[class*="Header"]  ,
*[id*="hlavicka"]  ,
*[id*="Hlavicka"]  ,
*[class*="hlavicka"]  ,
*[class*="Hlavicka"]
{ background-color : black !important
}

/*
 * - real
*/
header  ,
#head  ,
#header  ,
#top   /* ?: disputable */
{ background-color : blue !important
}

/*
  * navigation :
  * ( 'menu predicting magic' )
 *
*/

/*
 * - wannabe
*/
.navlist a  ,
.Navlist a  ,
*.navigation a  ,
*[id*="menu"] a  ,
*[id*="Menu"] a  ,
*[id*="navig"] a  ,
*[id*="Navig"] a  ,
*[id$="nav"] a  ,
*[id$="Nav"] a  ,
*[class*="menu"] a  ,
*[class*="Menu"] a  ,
*[class*="navig"] a  ,
*[class*="Navig"] a  ,
*[class$="nav"] a  ,
*[class$="Nav"] a
{ background-color : midnightblue !important
}

/*
 * - real
*/
label  , /* ! label added, let's see */
nav a  ,
menu a  ,
#menu a  ,
#navigation a
{ background-color : gold !important
}

/* above ID selectors would override below rules
 * due # selector priority
 * so that's why this :
*/
#menu a:hover  ,
#navigation a:hover
{ background-color : gold !important
}

/*
  * aside:
 *
*/

/*
 * - wannabe
*/
div[id*="side"]  ,
div[id*="Side"]  ,
div[class*="side"]  ,
div[class*="Side"]
{ background-color : black !important
}

/*
 * - real
*/
aside  ,
.aside  ,
#aside
{ background-color : green !important
}

/*
 * footer
*/

footer  ,
div[id*="foot"]  ,
div[class*="foot"]  ,
div[id*="paticka"]  ,
div[class*="paticka"]
{ background-color : gold !important
}

/*
  * others semantic blocks
  * (yet unimplemented)
 *
*/
/*
article  {
}

#main  {
}

#content  {
}

section  ,
.section  {
}

.divider  {
}
/* */



/*
  * anonymous heading elements
 *
*/

*[class*="heading"]  ,
*[class*="Heading"]  ,
*[id*="heading"]  ,
*[id*="Heading"]  ,
*[class*="nadpis"]  ,
*[class*="Nadpis"]  ,
*[id*="nadpis"]  ,
*[id*="Nadpis"]
{ border-color : lime !important
; color        : gold !important
}




/*
  *
   * concrete HTML block elements
  *
 *
*/

/*
  * headers
  * h1 , h2 , h3 , h4 , h5 , h6
  * caption , th , lh , dt , legend
 *
*/
h1
{ background-color : black !important
; border-color     : lime !important
; color            : #4f6f6f !important
}

h2  ,
h3  ,
h4  ,
h5  ,
h6  ,
caption  , /* table h. */
th  , /* table-row|column h. */
lh  , /* list h. html3. how f***ing usefull element. deprecated. */
dl dt  , /* definition h. */
html fieldset legend   /* form h. */
{ background-color : forestgreen !important
; border-color     : #999 !important
; color            : gold !important
}

/*
  * other stuff
  * now they have the same colour;
  * it would be nice if it was distinguishable simply by colour
 *
*/

blockquote  ,
code  , /* code is inline */
xmp  ,
pre
{ background-color : gray !important
}

td  {
 /* tried, but it was not good */
}

hr
{ background-color : gold !important
; border-color     : #666 !important
; color            : black!important
}


/*
  *
   * concrete HTML inline elements
   * - just colour altered
  *
 *
*/

/*
  * emphasis:
 *
*/

/*
 * - wannabe
*/
*[id*="important"]  ,
*[id*="Important"]  ,
*[class*="important"]  ,
*[class*="Important"]
{ border-color : black !important
; color        : black !important
}

/*
 * - wannabe #2
 * ( yes, it is NOT semantic, but this is usefull, trust me ;] )
*/
b  ,
b *  ,
i  ,
i *
{ border-color : #fff !important
; color        : silver !important
}

/*
 * real
*/
em  ,
em *  ,
strong  ,
strong *
{ border-color : black !important
; color        : black !important
}

/*
  *
   * common "semantic" classes
   * initally based on WHATWG HTML5 specs draft
   * ("semantic classes" have been rejected)
   * but here may be very usefull
  *
 *
*/

/*
  * current / active
  * usefull especially for
  * - "active" tabs,
  * - "current" links in menu
 *
*/
.current  ,
.selected  ,
.active
{ background-color : #000 !important
; color            : black !important
}

*[class*=Current]  ,
*[class*=Selected]  ,
*[class*=Active]  ,
*[class*=current]  ,
*[class*=selected]  ,
*[class*=active]
{ background-color : black !important
; color            : black !important
}

/*
  * other not-so-common classes
 *
*/
.copyright
{ color : black !important
}
.error
{ color : black !important
}
.warning
{ color : black !important
}
.example
{ color : black !important
}
.issue
{ color : black !important
}
.note
{ color : black!important
}
.search
{ color : black !important
}

/*
 * other funny WHATWG stuff
*/
*[irrelevant]
{
}

/*
  * links and interactive stuff
  * that is: links, labels and any other form element
  * with :hover / :active / :focus states
 *
*/

/*
 * "onclick warning"
*/
*[onclick]:hover
{ background-color : green !important
}

/*
 * properly coded label will behave as unvisited link
*/
label[for]  ,
a:link  ,
a:link *
{ border-color : black !important
; color        : ivory !important
}

label[for]:focus  ,
label[for]:hover  ,
a:link:focus  ,
a:link:hover
{ background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : black !important
; color            : ivory !important
}

a:link:focus *  ,
a:link:hover *
{ border-color : ivory !important
; color        : black !important
}

a:visited  ,
a:visited *
{ border-color : #690 !important
; color        : yellow !important
}

a:visited:focus  ,
a:visited:hover
{ background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : #9c3 !important
; color            : #cf9 !important
}

a:visited:focus *  ,
a:visited:hover *
{ border-color : #9c3 !important
; color        : #cf9 !important
}

/*
 * active. no matter if visited or not
*/
a:active  ,
a:active *
{ border-color : #600 !important
; color        : #f33 !important
}

/*
  * form elems and some IMO neat effects
 *
*/
html button  ,
html select  ,
html input
{ background-color : #222 !important
}

html input[type="password"]
{ background-color : #755 !important
}

html textarea  ,
html input[type="text"]  ,
html input:not([type])
{ background-color : #555 !important
}

html textarea:hover  ,
html input[type="text"]:hover  ,
html input:not([type]):hover
{ background-color : #444 !important
}

html textarea:focus  ,
html input:focus  ,
html button:focus  ,
html textarea:focus:hover  ,
html input:focus:hover  ,
html button:focus:hover
{ background-color : #000 !important
; border-color     : #fff !important
}

html input[type="password"]:focus
{ background-color : #300 !important
}

input[disabled]
{ color : #888 !important
}

/*
  *
   * fixes and tweaks
  *
 *
*/


/*
  * FF3 fix, hope it will work
  * +2008-08-18+
 *
*/
html button  ,
html select  ,
html input  ,
html textarea
{ -moz-appearance : none !important
}


/*
  * give solid bg to some elems that deserve it
 *
*/

/* dropdowns that was not catched
 * by above 'menu predicting magic'
*/
li:hover li
{ background-color : #333 !important
}

/* wd DOM inspector
*/
div[id^=webdeveloper]
{ background-color : #333 !important
}

/* flashblock. bruteforce.
*/
div[style~="url(chrome://flashblock/content/flash.png)"]
{ background-color : #630 !important
}

/* last.fm
*/
td.quantifier > div  ,
div.graph > div#tomGraph
{ background-color : #222 !important
}

/* search hilite
*/
span#__firefox-findbar-search-id
{ background-color : #9ff !important
}

/* imageblock
*//* * ( my upcoming userscript, maybe one time... /
span.imgBlock-mask
{ outline: 1px dotted
; text-align: center
; overflow: hidden
}
/* */

/* gmail (2D: maybe more specific context)
*/
#pop
{ background-color : #222 !important
}


/*
  * no underline for links
  * disputable.
  * but isn't strict colour difference enough?
 *
*[DISABLED]/
a
{ text-decoration : none !important
}
/* */


}

/*
 END
 "myfavolours" - global custom colour scheme
 http://userstyles.org/styles/2187
*/
